purpose: Blueprint for adding project cards to the website feed in main/projects.json.

projectObjectSchema.name: string (required)
projectObjectSchema.status: string (required) - suggested values: open source, closed source, research, private

projectTemplate.name: Project Name
projectTemplate.description: Two to four sentences describing capability, users, and current scope.

workflow: Copy projectTemplate into main/projects.json under the projects array.
Replace placeholder values with real project content.
Keep stack tags short and lowercase for visual consistency.
Use external=true for off-site links so they open in a new tab.
If no thumbnail is provided, the card will render a themed placeholder panel.
